entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
